name: MoPub-IronSource-Adapters
summary: IronSource Adapters for mediating through MoPub.
description:
Supported ad formats: Interstitial, Rewarded Video.

To download and integrate the IronSource SDK, please check this tutorial: https://developers.ironsrc.com/ironsource-mobile/ios/ios-sdk/ 


For inquiries and support, please check https://developers.ironsrc.com/submit-a-request/
